Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Bryn Smith (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1985, off Bryn Smith (MON)...
Injured on 6/29/1985 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/1985, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 8/28/1987...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pittsburgh, driving in 6 runs on 4/24/1988...
8/17/1988: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $1,790,000 per year, for 2 years.
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 9/3/1988...
Traded from Atlanta to St. Louis on 5/26/1989 (Going to STL: 3B Bob Horner. Going to ATL: P Graeme Lloyd)...
Hit for the cycle against Pittsburgh on 4/14/1990...
Traded from St. Louis to Detroit on 7/27/1990 (Going to STL: P Dave Mlicki, P Pedro Borbon. Going to DET: 3B Bob Horner)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/16/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $4,190,000 per year...
